items.summary: Update the signup page frontend to ensure that the username value sent to the backend register function is normalized to lowercase (trimmed of leading/trailing whitespace and lowercased) before submission, so the stored username is always in a consistent canonical form.

Fix the backend register function so that username uniqueness checks are performed in a case-insensitive manner. Normalize both the stored usernames and the incoming username to lowercase (or a consistent canonical form) before comparison, so that a genuinely unique username is never incorrectly rejected with a 'username already taken' error.
